Reviews.Title: Worked as replacement for Saturn Aura
Reviews.Author: MikeF
Reviews.Content: If you have a Saturn Aura or the similar Chevy models, you may know that the OEM auto door locks are garbage. They fail frequently and are brutally expensive to buy OEM replacement parts for. I was able to follow some awesome step by step instructions on the chevymalibuforum website to install two of these in the rear doors of a 2008 Saturn Aura. I was able to install both of them in about 3 hours and they seem to be working great. Fixed both doors for less than $25. OEM parts are over $200 each!

Reviews.Title: 93 del sol with crappy aftermarket actuators.
Reviews.Author: Jaspreet S Mushiana
Reviews.Content: having a car that never came with power door locks(93 sols didnt.) the previous owners installed some very cheap ones that began to fail and cause non stop issues with the locking ang unlocking of my vehicle. after installing these in place of the horrid ones they had installed, all my issues where solved. yeah they are a little loud, but if thats honestly a concern to you while looking at AFTERMARKET actuators, you might want to look into paying 4x as much for "OEM" ones.

Reviews.Title: Strong
Reviews.Author: V. B.
Reviews.Content: This item is excelent and it's stronger than OEM actuator which I replace from Mazda MPV. Will buy again for a different setup. Great bargain.

Reviews.Title: reliable
Reviews.Author: D. Wray
Reviews.Content: Installed in my 97 Outback Sport for a wireless entry system.  After finding a decent spot in the door to mount, it was fairly straightforward.  Has been operating reliably for a while now, no issues.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my Tacoma DIY cargo bed lock project.
Reviews.Author: AF Ret
Reviews.Content: Used them to build a DIY cargo bed door lock for my Tacoma. The have a very strong push and pull movement. It latches and unlocks with ease and authority without being loud as it moves. No chatter of pauses.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Icky doo
Reviews.Content: This is a genuine DEI door lock actuator. I purchased it to replace a replacement door lock that went bad. The original actuator crapped out, I installed a new (crap) one which died less than a year later. I got this Install Essentials actuator, (at a cheaper price than the one it replaced) and it's even quieter than the one that went bad. I would buy another one to hold onto in case the driver door actuator goes out. If you need to buy a door lock actuator, you can't go wrong with this one.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install, great quality
Reviews.Author: R. Pastenes
Reviews.Content: I installed this on a 2003 Hyundai Elantra that has centralized door lock but not keyless entry. In order to make the keyless entry work I needed one of these installed in the driver's door. The installation was super easy thanks to the included accessories. The only cons, if any, is that is a little bit too noisy for my taste, but I'm ok with it.

Reviews.Title: more than expected
Reviews.Author: pacman359
Reviews.Content: I was expecting simply an actuator and perhaps a few screws for the car models that this fits - but what I received was a pleasant surprise. This kit includes a bit of wire tubing, wiring and connectors, adjustable rod, mounting bracket, and additional hardware. Since I am trying to add a trunk-unlock actuator to a car that doesn't have one, this setup is perfect because it will allow me to improvise a bit around how to hook it up. I quickly hooked the actuator up to a 12v battery and it looks like it will do the job just fine. Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Worked Perfect
Reviews.Author: dhutton92
Reviews.Content: Back door of 2002 Ford Escape wouldn't unlock if the temperature outside was hot (>80 degrees Fahrenheit). This obviously was a huge inconvenience. Decided to get this one versus the "Galaxy AC-1 Actuator". The 10 extra dollars was work it. Had to just use electrical tape to secure the wires but worked great!

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly Well Built
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: This unit is far superior to the "SOBO" that came with my generic power lock kit and failed after a few years. Not only is the action fairly quiet but it also has a much thicker protective boot.

Reviews.Title: The Real Deal
Reviews.Author: Tom D.
Reviews.Content: Thank you Amazon...This is the real DEI model 524T door lock actuator and not a cheap knock off.  If you are doing a new install, you want this one.  It came in a box with all the mounting screws, rod, bar, rubber boots & wire that you will not get with the cheaper knock offs.  If you're just doing a replacement like me I would still recommend this one.  The reason is this actuator weighs more than the knock offs & better made.  Yes the others may be cheaper, but I question the reliability.  Also, the savings are not worth my time if I am replacing it sooner than later.

Reviews.Title: Powerful Actuator
Reviews.Author: R. Leon "Mr. Engineer"
Reviews.Content: After doing some research this model was chosen due to its reputation of providing more power to the latches than other available models. Also, this model comes with everything shown in the picture.The 524T was installed as a replacement actuator for a previously installed but different model. This model and the other model had almost the exact same body and dimensionally they were the same. Therefore the existing holes worked perfectly. After installing the new unit I was thrilled at how well it performed. Honestly, the old actuator was never as powerful as this one.This actuator is a little more expensive than other models out there, but if you are going to tear your vehicle apart to add power door locks spend the extra money and do it right the first time.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install and works great
Reviews.Author: Rich Holm
Reviews.Content: Added this to my 1999 honda Civic when I installed my Viper alarm. Works great especially when paired with the door lock relay 451m by Install Essentials installation is simple plug and play.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value for the money
Reviews.Author: M. T. McNeight
Reviews.Content: Received the item in a very short time.  The kit is very complete with easy to understand installation instructions.  The item works very well.

Reviews.Title: Good price, as promised
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "flyinglow"
Reviews.Content: This unit came on time as promised.  I replaced a previously installed after market actuator with this one on my 2000 Nissan in 30 minutes.  A local shop wanted to charge $180 for the parts+labor.

Reviews.Title: Didn't fit!
Reviews.Author: Linda Haneline
Reviews.Content: In spite of the fact that it said it would fit my 2001 Escape, my husband had to modify it to make it fit! Good thing he is a machinist with a shop here at the house. Don't know what the average person would do.

Standard 2-Wire Power Door Lock Motor

For Adding Power Door Locks To Most Vehicles
